title: iOS 15.5 re-enables API to let Apple Music third-party clients change playback speed
content:
MusicKit is an official Apple API that lets developers create apps, such as third-party clients, with access to Apple Music. For some unknown reason, the company had removed the ability to let these apps control playback speed – but now this feature will be back with iOS 15.5.

more…

The post iOS 15.5 re-enables API to let Apple Music third-party clients change playback speed appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple had removed the ability to let Apple Music apps control playback speed – but now this feature will be back with iOS 15.5.
